data.text:
When a boy is born in an Indian family, people celebrate. But, who knew that a boy, from an ordinary family in a small town Tarn Taran of Punjab State, will bring fortune for his family in an overseas country. Born in a Sikh family on July 17, 1982, Gurbaksh migrated to California, USA with his family in 1986 due to Sikh separated movement in India at that time. In the US, his mother worked as a nurse while his father was an employee with postal services. They were a hard working couple and wanted to give every facility to their four kids. But unfortunately, the kids were bullied in the school and other places as they used to wear turbans and grew a beard. They looked different from the rest of children which lead to discrimination at such young age.

His Previous Ventures that Created Sensation in the Online Industry

By the time, Gurbaksh was 16 years old; he developed interest towards online marketing and the stock market. He started his career from his home, and his first start-up business was ClickAgents. It was an online advertisement company. Chahal had big dreams and wanted to be successful one day. He worked hard towards achieving his goals. ClickAgent did well in the online ad market.

Gurbaksh left his house, when he was 18, to pursue his career in Internet ad industry. He sold ClickAgents for 40 million dollars and started his next venture in the same field. His next company was Blue Lithium, an online global ad network, was an even bigger success. This company was taken over by Yahoo Inc. in September 2007, for 300 million dollars.

This multimillionaire was also an eminent writer and a philanthropist. He wrote a book and named it “The Dreams.” the book was an instant hit. Gurbaksh has mentioned about his journey as an ordinary man, towards the successful heights, waiting for him. He penned down all his struggles and how he overcame those hurdles. The book is amazingly good and motivates thousands of aspiring young entrepreneurs. Many revelations in this book by Gurbaksh created curiosity amongst millions of his fans.The book sold millions of copies in the initial weeks only. GurbakshChahal also established a non-profit organization called Chahal Foundation, along with two more companies. His foundation was inaugurated in the year 2014, the same year when he started his Internet ad network also, which was named Gravity 4.

Gurbaksh’s Current Holdings

Presently, Gurbaksh is Gravity 4 CEO and still contributing towards the automation of Internet advertising industry. The company earned a position in the ad industry on the web. This company is famous for developing the World’s first High-Frequency Marketing Operating System that can alter the SaaS as well as online ad industry. It allows the advertiser to target a client and track their behaviors throughout the purchase cycle. The company allows the advertisers to collect customer’s data from various platforms such as the Internet, CRM, mobile phone, e-mail as well as social media. And this all happens with just a click.

Gravity 4 is a subsidiary of G4 Holdings worldwide. Its corporate office is in Miami, Florida. The firm has more than 400 operators in various locations around the globe. Gravity 4 has offices in more than twenty-one countries, including Australia, United Kingdom, Sweden, Malaysia, China, Canada, Romania, Chicago, New York, Brazil, Netherland, Norway, etc. Other than the tracking tools for advertisers, the company also offers online advertising purchases services such as inventory management, billing, and reporting, etc.

Gravity 4 acquired a lot of companies; some of them are Exovue, Triggit, Conyak, EZlike, adX Search, Zurmo, Argyle Socia, Pixels and Kanary NEST. The company has an excellent reputation in its niche and under the brilliant direction of Gurbaksh as its CEO; the company is achieving new horizons every year.Gravity 4 Revenues are estimated to be over 100 million dollars annually as per recent press reports.

The other divisions of G4 Holdings are G4 Pharmaceuticals and G4 Natural Resources.

About G4 Holdings Worldwide

G4 Worldwide was founded by Gurbaksh Singh Chahal in the year 2014. It is a global merger of various organizations in different sectors such as media, energy, pharmaceuticals, software, and marketing. This international conglomerate has more than thousand employees working in more than 20 countries across the globe.

Gurbaksh, the Indian American entrepreneur, feels that the growth of the economy depends upon the global health and if we want to achieve high goals in the world economy, we should work towards social health and prosperity. He believes that the successful healthcare opportunities can only be provided to common people of society if pharmaceuticals and other medical facilities are implemented all over the globe to prevent millions of patients from suffering from different ailments and medical conditions.

The motives of the company are:

To reduce the suffering of patients

To avoid surgeries of fatal diseases in their last stage

To make the stay in the hospital as minimum as possible for the patients who cannot afford higher cost of treatment

That is the reason why Chahal started the pharmaceutical division under G4 Holdings. He wanted to provide affordable medicines to patients who are suffering from severe diseases, last stage of deadly ailments and unprivileged people who cannot afford expensive treatments. He wants to save millions of people who die because of lack of treatment due to expensive drugs. His work in the pharmaceutical industry is admirable.

G4 Natural Resources

The focus of the G4 Natural Resources division of G4 Holdings is to emphasize on energy supply issues and to deliver the generic energy demand of various industries. G4 Natural Resources supplies the advanced energy solutions to various government and private sectors including automotive, steel and power generation and fulfill their demand for metallurgical coal and thermal energy.

This energy solution company of Gurbaksh has also earned a great reputation in the market for providing affordable energy solutions. The team of the company is doing an incredible job and the company is generating great revenues.

The motives of G4 Natural Resources are:

To optimize the use of energy through advancement in the technology

Its qualified professionals work towards fulfilling the current energy demands by in-depth analysis of present resources to improve the supply to satisfy the required energy demands.

The team of G4 natural resources is dedicated towards finding new technologies so that future energy demands can easily be taken care of.

To provide affordable, sensible and ecological energy solutions to various industries

Gurbaksh started the G4 Holdings Worldwide with the vision of moving towards a progressive society. Chahal wants to leave a legacy in the world so that people remember him. He has done tremendous work for the betterment of the humankind. And all his companies have the same motive, “A singular vision, striving to make a difference.”
